personalInfo.name: Shashank Kumar
personalInfo.title: Senior Data Labeling & AI Training Specialist | Full-Stack & AI Engineer
personalInfo.tagline: Available for worldwide freelance and contract engagements

professionalSummary: AI Systems Engineer with 4+ years of experience architecting intelligent systems and scalable applications. Delivered measurable impact by improving model safety by 25%, building AI agents with 85% task accuracy, and engineering solutions that drove 150% client growth. Combines expertise in LLM fine-tuning, multi-agent architecture, and production-grade deployment.

technicalSkills.AI_ML: LLM Fine-Tuning (LoRA, DPO), RAG Pipeline Development, Prompt Engineering, Model Evaluation (MT-Bench, HELM), AI Agent Orchestration, NVIDIA Isaac Sim
technicalSkills.Programming: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, C#, SQL, Bash
technicalSkills.Backend: FastAPI, Flask, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, RESTful APIs
technicalSkills.Frontend: Next.js 14, React, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, CSS3
technicalSkills.Tools: Docker, Git, GitHub Actions, n8n, AWS, Hugging Face, OpenAI API, Anthropic API

experience.company: Contract for AI Research Platforms (via Upwork, Outlier, OneForma)
details: Improved model safety scores by 25% by designing and executing 500+ adversarial prompts for red-teaming frontier LLMs.
Accelerated data pipeline efficiency by 30% by creating annotation scripts and ontology systems for 10,000+ multilingual NLP samples, maintaining 98% QA accuracy.
Trained and evaluated 3+ major LLMs on reasoning and code-generation tasks, directly contributing to production release cycles.
Consistently rated Top Performer (top 5%) across 1,000+ complex evaluation tasks.
Annotating 10k+ text/voice datasets for multilingual models.
Designing ontology management systems for LLM/Voice AI.
Leading prompt complexity evaluation & metadata accuracy.
Architected 30+ full-stack applications, including 5+ AI-powered SaaS tools that automated workflows for 100+ monthly active users.
Boosted client revenue by 40% for 3 key accounts by building custom RAG chatbots that improved support answer accuracy by 60%.
Drove 150% average increase in organic traffic and automated 500+ business processes, saving clients 20+ hours per week.
Maintained 99.9% uptime and sub-second load times for all deployed applications.

projects.name: Verdant AI: Multi-Agent Orchestration System
projects.description: High-performance system that autonomously solves coding and physics problems with 85% success rate.
bullets: Engineered a 7-agent swarm using Router-Delegate pattern, reducing task completion time by 70%.
Integrated LoRA fine-tuned Llama 3 and GPT-4 via unified adapter layer, handling 50+ concurrent simulations.

projects.name: NeuroSim Engine: AI Character Simulation
projects.description: Simulation platform creating psychologically realistic AI agents with dynamic emotional states.
bullets: Implemented trait-emotion-goal architecture generating 2,000+ unique behavioral sequences for game NPCs.
Reduced AI scripting time by 50% via visual behavior tree editor and modular emotion system.

projects.name: GMX TradeDesk: DeFi Trading Automation
projects.description: Desktop application for automated trading strategies on GMX V2 perpetuals exchange.
bullets: Developed real-time position manager monitoring 10+ market indicators with sub-100ms execution latency.
Built backtesting engine simulating 500+ historical trading scenarios.

projects.name: Isaac Sim Physics: Breakable Object Simulation
projects.description: Robotics training environment simulating complex breakage dynamics for ML data generation.
bullets: Created 761-line modular physics simulation featuring configurable D6 joints and progressive damage.
Generated 1,000+ training samples for reinforcement learning models at 60 FPS real-time.

projects.name: Healthcare AI Chatbot
projects.description: AI chatbot with 92% accuracy, reduced response time by 80%.
